pages.text: $(li)The Lapis Lazuli is rock with magic propierties that can be found and mined in the Caves over the Overworld.$(br)$(li)It can be found in $(l:patchouli:perks/loot_chest)Loot Chests$(/l) too.$(br)$(li)The Lapis Lazuli is a needed material in the $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/enchanting_table)Enchanting Table$(/l).

$(li)You can use Lapis Lazuli to craft a $(l)Blue Dye$(), $(l:patchouli:armors/lapis_armor)Lapis Lazuli Armor$(/l) or a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/lapis_lazuli_block)Lapis Lazuli Block$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).
